## Use of a broken or weak cryptographic algorithm

A broken or weak cryptographic algorithm depends on [sensitive data froma call to uid](1).

[Show more details](https://github.com/nestjs/nest/security/code-scanning/33)

If this is a real problem, I can change to `sha256`:

```
sha1 x 468,715 ops/sec ±3.29% (75 runs sampled)
sha256 x 566,101 ops/sec ±1.40% (88 runs sampled)
sha512 x 461,978 ops/sec ±2.02% (93 runs sampled)
md5 x 463,071 ops/sec ±4.47% (76 runs sampled)
```

It's a little bit faster anyways.
